question: Match the plant growth hormones of Column-I with suitable chemical derivatives present in Column-ll and choose the correct option given below:
Column - I: (a) Abscisic acid, (b) Gibberellins, (c) Kinetin, (d) Auxin
Column - II: (i) Adenine derivative, (ii) Indole acetic acid, (iii) Carotenoid derivative, (iv) Terpens
explanation: Abscisic acid is a Carotenoid derivative (iii); Gibberellins are Terpenes (iv); Kinetin is an Adenine derivative (i); Auxin is an Indole compound (ii) [cite: 435-457, 480].
